title: Mike Evans reveals how he found out Tom Brady was returning
description:
Adam Schefter has the latest on the Browns quarterback situation, Terry McLaurin signs one of the biggest WR extensions this offseason, and Mike Evans reveals a hilarious interaction he and Tom Brady had before Brady said he was unretiring. Schefter also remembers the passing of Hank Goldberg.
